import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const LocalInspection = () => { // Define the initial state to store form input values const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ vehicleTag: "", date: "", mileage: "", workTicket: "", personReleasingVehicle: "", bodyOfVehicle: null, tiresConditionAndAirPressure: null, horn: null, stateInspectionAndLicSticker: null, wipersReservoir: null, lowAndHighBeamHeadlights: null, brakeLights: null, turnSignalLights: null, emergencyFlasherLights: null, vehicleInsuranceCardValid: null, gasTankFull: null, emergencyInstructions: null, washVehicle: null, comments: "", dpwSignature: "", }); // Handle form input changes const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; const newValue = type === "checkbox" ? checked : value; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: newValue }); }; // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const confirmation = await axios.post( "http://localhost:5000/local-inspections/", formData, { withCredentials: true, } ); if (confirmation) { alert("New Local Inspection entry success!"); } } catch (error) { // todo throw proper error message passed in, out alert(error.message); } }; return (

Local Vehicle Inspection
